item.title: DCS World Performance and Settings Guide
item.description: Recommended system, graphical and gameplay settings for DCS World. Last updated May 2024 for DCS 2.9.5.55300. Photo by Generic (@generic_dcs) Recommended Specs Storage You MUST install DCS on an SSD (solid state) instead of an HDD (spinning disk). The base game is 160GB and a large install is 700GB+. A dedicated 1TB or larger high performance SSD is recommended. Tom’s Hardware: Best SSDs An SSD is absolutely essential. When installed on a spinning disk, DCS can take over 20 minutes to load into a mission and may crash during loading or during gameplay.

item.title: Wardogs of Sand Island
item.description: An adaptation of the first several missions of Ace Combat 5: The Unsung War into DCS World as a series of 4-player cooperative missions. Requirements: Marianas terrain, F-4E Phantom 01//SHOREBIRDS While attempting to force a spy plane to land, Wardog Squadron encounters unknown fighters. Download MIZ 02//OPEN WAR Wardog Squadron intercepts recon UAVs launched by an unidentified ship. Download MIZ CHANGELOG
